title: CBRE Real Estate Web App
description: Property management tool with Mapbox and real-time data.
fullDescription: Developed a frontend application for CBRE Singapore using React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Mapbox to visualize real estate leasing data and manage properties across multiple views.

title: AI-powered Resume Chat
description: Interactive resume Q&A powered by Groq, LangChain, and Supabase.
fullDescription: A fullstack AI service allowing users to chat with a resume using Groq's LLaMA 3, LangChain for retrieval, and Supabase for vector search and storage. Built with FastAPI and integrated into a Next.js frontend.

title: BKRM Middleware API for Banking
description: Banking integration platform built with Apache Camel and Talend.
fullDescription: Worked on a middleware API for BKRM using Apache Camel and Talend Studio to facilitate integration between internal banking systems and external services, deployed on GCP.
